title: Funnel & Marketing Strategist
job_overview:
We're looking for a Funnel & Marketing Strategist who can help us design and map out an end-to-end client journey—from awareness to paid offer to long-term retention.

This is a strategy-first role.

You're not here to just write ads or build pages. You're here to architect our client acquisition, conversion, delivery, and retention systems—and make sure our funnel works like a well-oiled machine.

Your Responsibilities:

1. Audit our current marketing, offer, and sales process

2. Map out a complete marketing funnel from:
---->Lead Generation (content, ads, lead magnets)
---->Lead Nurturing (VSL funnel, emails, DM strategy)
----> Conversion (sales page, call booking, Messenger strategy)
---->Delivery (client onboarding systems)
---->Retention (post-retreat offers, memberships, email reactivation)

3. Help us restructure and reprice our offers.

4. Work with our VA to implement the strategy.

You’re a Great Fit If:

1. You’ve built or planned funnels that have worked (with portfolio or references)
2. You understand the full funnel journey: ads ? lead ? nurture ? sale ? delivery ? upsell
3. You can confidently advise on offer structure, pricing, messaging, and client journey
4. You’ve worked with coaches, consultants, or healing/wellness brands (big plus)
5. You’re a great communicator who can work directly with the founder and our small team

We’re flexible with hours per week, as long as deadlines and outcomes are met.
